title: I’m Engaged, I’m Getting Married, Ahhh!
description:
On this week’s episode of Chic Shit Only, Lauren is all chic and no shit. She’s soaking in the happiness of a beautiful time and spilling some deets on her wine-soaked engagement weekend with Chris Harrison. Cheers to love, babes!
Watch the podcast on YouTube: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyYT
Watch the podcast on IG: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyIG
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or by using this link: https://bit.ly/ChicShitOnlyPodcast
